level.heading: Water and water service rates and charges.
CREDIT(S)
level.text: (Oct. 21, 1975, D.C. Law 1-23, title VII, § 701(a), 22 DCR 2114; repealed pursuant to § 302 of D.C. Law 11-111.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2413.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 304 of D.C. Law 11- 111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
